column5: What are the dates for this year's Lakair G2G.  Thanks  Rick
I believe it's the 21st and 22nd of June. Some folks will arrive the week before, and some will stay for the week after.  The Pike tourney will be on the 21st.
The Pike derby is on June 21. There will be a bunch of people there on both sides of that weekend. -Brian
I'll be there too. So, even small folks are welcome.
